channel.title: Raccoon on Ecology Games
channel.description: Recent content in Raccoon on Ecology Games

item.title: Master Thesis Evaluating BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage
item.description: Pamela Neff’s Master’s thesis explores the effectiveness of “BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage”, a board game designed to educate players about the complexities of managing invasive species, specifically raccoons in Europe.

item.title: BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage
item.description: BioInvaders: Raccoon Rampage is a semi-cooperative board game where players take on roles like environmental agencies, hunters, or animal rights lobbyists, each with their own unique agenda. While working together to prevent raccoons from wreaking ecological havoc across Europe, players must also balance collaboration with rivalries to achieve their personal objectives.

item.title: European BioInvasions
item.description: European BioInvasions is a role-playing game aimed at expert and real life stakeholders that have to deal with invasive species. The game covers multiple species and how we might manage them in different potential European futures
